name: Dreams are not real
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 by
Luponas (Sprites & Textures),
Yuon (Music) and
Umbrason (Coding & 3D Modelling)

In this short little game you have to find your way out of a dream by exiting through an ominous gate! The aesthetic is base on a cardboard/paper world in the style of Paper Mario / Little Big Planet.

Sadly this game is not available to play in the browser,
because it uses Unity's HDRP, which does not support WebGL.

If you enjoy solving puzzles or doing escape rooms we heavily suggest you to try it out anyways!

Controls:

Use WASD to move around
Press 'E' to interact with nearby objects!

Click objects you collected to take a closer look.
You can also rotate objects while viewing them.

Use the Middle Mouse Button to look around!

Have fun!
